name: SE2-03 — THE HOLLOW AT BOILEAU
description:
Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare (Lazare Picault). Anse Boileau, Mahé. In Boileau's hollow, a blade once bit the map.
Lift the stone; the hillside whispers where to climb.

attributes.value: Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare

properties.cipher: notches around the hollow align with ridge silhouette.
properties.clue:
In Boileau's hollow, a blade once bit the map.
Lift the stone; the hillside whispers where to climb.
properties.visual_description: Stream through mangrove; a hollow stone with scratch marks; dagger pommel in sand; coin spill in lantern gold; low fog.
